title: Lemmas for class substitution
content: Some useful theorems for dealing with substitutions: ~ sbbi , ~ sbcbig , ~ sbcel1g , ~ sbcel2 , ~ sbcel12 , ~ sbceqg , ~ csbvarg .

blocks.name: bj-sbeqALT
blocks.content: Substitution in an equality (use the more genereal version ~ bj-sbeq instead, without disjoint variable condition). (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-sbeqALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(csb(s1, cv(s0), c0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  sbie(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s1, cv(s0), c0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)))
  nfeq(s1, csb(s1, cv(s0), c0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1))
  nfcsb1v(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  nfcsb1v(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  eqeq12d(c0, c1, csb(s1, cv(s0), c0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  csbeq1a(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  csbeq1a(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-sbeqALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ([s0 / s1]c0 = c1 ↔[s0 / s1]c0 =[s0 / s1]c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  sbie(s0, s1, c0 = c1, [s0 / s1]c0 =[s0 / s1]c1)
  nfeq(s1, [s0 / s1]c0, [s0 / s1]c1)
  nfcsb1v(s1, s0, c0)
  nfcsb1v(s1, s0, c1)
  eqeq12d(c0, c1, [s0 / s1]c0, [s0 / s1]c1, s1 = s0)
  csbeq1a(s1, s0, c0)
  csbeq1a(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: bj-sbeq
blocks.content: Distribute proper substitution through an equality relation. (See ~ sbceqg ). (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-sbeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(csb(s1, cv(s0), c0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)))
} = {
  bitr4i(wsb(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(csb(s1, cv(s0), c0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)))))
  3bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c1)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)))), wal(hs0, wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wal(hs0, wb(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  3bitri(wsb(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c1)), wal(hs0, wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wsb(s0, s1, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  sbbii(s0, s1, wceq(c0, c1), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  dfcleq(hs0, c0, c1)
  sbsbc(s0, s1, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  sbcal(s1, hs0, cv(s0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  albii(hs0, wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wb(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wb(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(cv(s0), universe))
  vex(s0)
  sbcbig(s1, cv(s0), universe, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  albii(hs0, wb(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1))))
  bibi12i(wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)))
  sbcel2(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0)
  sbcel2(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  dfcleq(hs0, csb(s1, cv(s0), c0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s1, cv(s0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s1, cv(s0), c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-sbeq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ([s0 / s1]c0 = c1 ↔[s0 / s1]c0 =[s0 / s1]c1)
} = {
  bitr4i([s0 / s1]c0 = c1, [s0 / s1]c0 =[s0 / s1]c1, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈[s0 / s1]c0 ↔ hs0 ∈[s0 / s1]c1)))
  3bitri([s0 / s1]c0 = c1, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈[s0 / s1]c0 ↔ hs0 ∈[s0 / s1]c1)), ∀(hs0,[s0 / s1](hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)), ∀(hs0,([s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c0 ↔[s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c1)))
  3bitri([s0 / s1]c0 = c1, ∀(hs0,[s0 / s1](hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)), [s0 / s1]∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)), [s0 / s1]∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  sbbii(s0, s1, c0 = c1, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  dfcleq(hs0, c0, c1)
  sbsbc(s0, s1, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  sbcal(s1, hs0, s0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1))
  albii(hs0, [s0 / s1](hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1), ([s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c0 ↔[s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c1))
  ax-mp(([s0 / s1](hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ hs0 ∈ c1)↔([s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c0 ↔[s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c1)), s0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s0)
  sbcbig(s1, s0, universe, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  albii(hs0, ([s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c0 ↔[s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈[s0 / s1]c0 ↔ hs0 ∈[s0 / s1]c1))
  bibi12i([s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c0, [s0 / s1]hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈[s0 / s1]c0, hs0 ∈[s0 / s1]c1)
  sbcel2(s1, s0, hs0, c0)
  sbcel2(s1, s0, hs0, c1)
  dfcleq(hs0, [s0 / s1]c0, [s0 / s1]c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c([s0 / s1]c0)
  diff.hs0.c([s0 / s1]c1)
}

blocks.name: bj-sbceqgALT
blocks.content: Distribute proper substitution through an equality relation. Alternate proof of ~ sbceqg . (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.) Proof modification is discouraged to avoid using ~ sbceqg , but "MM-PA> MINIMIZE_WITH * / EXCEPT sbceqg" is ok. (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-sbceqgALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
} = {
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c3)))))
  3bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c3)))), wal(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))), wal(hs0, wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wal(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))), wsbc(s0, c0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3)), wsbc(s0, c0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))), wsbc(s0, c0, wb(wceq(c2, c3), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  sbcth(s0, c0, c1, wb(wceq(c2, c3), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  dfcleq(hs0, c2, c3)
  sbcbig(s0, c0, c1, wceq(c2, c3), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))
  sbcal(s0, hs0, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)))
  albidv(hs0, wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))))
  sbcbig(s0, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  albidv(hs0, wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
  bibi12d(wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2))))
  sbcel2(s0, c0, cv(hs0), c2)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
  sbcel2(s0, c0, cv(hs0), c3)
  dfcleq(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-sbceqgALT(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →([c0 / s0]c2 = c3 ↔[c0 / s0]c2 =[c0 / s0]c3))
} = {
  syl6bbr(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]c2 = c3, [c0 / s0]c2 =[c0 / s0]c3, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c2 ↔ hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c3)))
  3bitrd(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]c2 = c3, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c2 ↔ hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c3)), ∀(hs0,[c0 / s0](hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈ c3)), ∀(hs0,([c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c2 ↔[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c3)))
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]c2 = c3, ∀(hs0,[c0 / s0](hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈ c3)), [c0 / s0]∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈ c3)))
  mpbid(c0 ∈ c1, ([c0 / s0]c2 = c3 ↔[c0 / s0]∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈ c3))), [c0 / s0](c2 = c3 ↔ ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈ c3))))
  sbcth(s0, c0, c1, (c2 = c3 ↔ ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈ c3))))
  dfcleq(hs0, c2, c3)
  sbcbig(s0, c0, c1, c2 = c3, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈ c3)))
  sbcal(s0, hs0, c0, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈ c3))
  albidv(hs0, c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0](hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈ c3), ([c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c2 ↔[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c3))
  sbcbig(s0, c0, c1, hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c3)
  albidv(hs0, c0 ∈ c1, ([c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c2 ↔[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c3), (hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c2 ↔ hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c3))
  bibi12d(c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c2, [c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c3, hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c2, hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c3)
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, ([c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c2 ↔ hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c2))
  sbcel2(s0, c0, hs0, c2)
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, ([c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c3 ↔ hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]c3))
  sbcel2(s0, c0, hs0, c3)
  dfcleq(hs0, [c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c([c0 / s0]c2)
  diff.hs0.c([c0 / s0]c3)
}

blocks.name: bj-csbsnlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ bj-csbsn (in this lemma, ` x ` cannot occur in ` A ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-csbsnlem(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, csb(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c0))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cab(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))
  abid(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  df-sbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))
  3bitri(wcel(c0, cab(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  clelab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))
  exbii(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  anbi2i(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  velsn(hs0, cv(s0))
  3bitri(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))), wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  exbii(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  pm5.32i(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqeq2(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))
  19.41v(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  impbii(wa(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  simpr(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ancri(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  eqvisset(hs0, c0)
  elisset(s0, c0, universe)
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))))))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cv(s0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-csbsnlem(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ [c0 / s0]{ s0 } = { c0 }
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, [c0 / s0]{ s0 }, { c0 })
  3bitr4i(hs0 ∈[c0 / s0]{ s0 }, hs0 ∈ { c0 }, hs0 ∈ { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ { s0 } }, hs0 = c0)
  3bitri(hs0 ∈ { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ { s0 } }, hs0 = c0, [c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ { s0 }, c0 ∈ { s0 | hs0 ∈ { s0 } })
  abid(hs0, [c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ { s0 })
  df-sbc(s0, c0, hs0 ∈ { s0 })
  3bitri(c0 ∈ { s0 | hs0 ∈ { s0 } }, hs0 = c0, ∃(s0,(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ { s0 })), ∃(s0,(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = s0)))
  clelab(s0, c0, hs0 ∈ { s0 })
  exbii(s0, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ { s0 }), (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = s0))
  anbi2i(s0 = c0, hs0 ∈ { s0 }, hs0 = s0)
  velsn(hs0, s0)
  3bitri(∃(s0,(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = s0)), hs0 = c0, ∃(s0,(s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c0)), (∃(s0, s0 = c0)∧ hs0 = c0))
  exbii(s0, (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = s0), (s0 = c0 ∧ hs0 = c0))
  pm5.32i(s0 = c0, hs0 = s0, hs0 = c0)
  eqeq2(s0, c0, hs0)
  19.41v(s0, s0 = c0, hs0 = c0)
  impbii((∃(s0, s0 = c0)∧ hs0 = c0), hs0 = c0)
  simpr(∃(s0, s0 = c0), hs0 = c0)
  ancri(hs0 = c0, ∃(s0, s0 = c0))
  syl(hs0 = c0, ∃(s0, s0 = c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqvisset(hs0, c0)
  elisset(s0, c0, universe)
  eleq2i(hs0, [c0 / s0]{ s0 }, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ { s0 } })
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, { s0 })
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c([c0 / s0]{ s0 })
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 })
}

blocks.name: bj-csbsn
blocks.content: Substitution in a singleton. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-csbsn(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c0))
} = {
  3eqtr3i(csb(s0, c0, csn(cv(s0))), csn(c0), csb(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0)))), csb(hs0, c0, csn(cv(hs0))))
  csbeq2i(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cv(hs0)))
  bj-csbsnlem(s0, cv(hs0))
  csbco(hs0, s0, c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  bj-csbsnlem(hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: bj-sbel1
blocks.content: Version of ~ sbcel1g when substituting a set. (Note: one could have a corresponding version of ~ sbcel12 when substituting a set, but the point here is that the antecedent of ~ sbcel1g is not needed when substituting a set.) (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)

blocks.name: bj-abv
blocks.content: The class of sets verifying a tautology is the universal class. (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-ab0
blocks.content: The class of sets verifying a falsity is the empty set (closed form of ~ abf ). (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-ab0(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), emptycls))
} = {
  sylibr(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), emptycls), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s0, w0)))))
  alrimih(hs0, wal(s0, wn(w0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s0, w0))))
  ax-5(hs0, wal(s0, wn(w0)))
  sylnibr(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(s0, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  sylib(wal(s0, wn(w0)), wn(wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, wn(w0)))
  stdpc4(s0, hs0, wn(w0))
  sbn(hs0, s0, w0)
  df-clab(hs0, s0, w0)
  eq0(hs0, cab(s0, w0))
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wn(w0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-ab0(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, ¬ w0)→ { s0 | w0 } = ∅)
} = {
  sylibr(∀(s0, ¬ w0), { s0 | w0 } = ∅, ∀(hs0, ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 | w0 }))
  alrimih(hs0, ∀(s0, ¬ w0), ¬ hs0 ∈ { s0 | w0 })
  ax-5(hs0, ∀(s0, ¬ w0))
  sylnibr(∀(s0, ¬ w0), hs0 ∈ { s0 | w0 }, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  sylib(∀(s0, ¬ w0), ¬[hs0 / s0]w0, [hs0 / s0]¬ w0)
  stdpc4(s0, hs0, ¬ w0)
  sbn(hs0, s0, w0)
  df-clab(hs0, s0, w0)
  eq0(hs0, { s0 | w0 })
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0, ¬ w0))
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 | w0 })
}

blocks.name: bj-abf
blocks.content: Shorter proof of ~ abf (which should be kept as abfALT). (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-csbprc
blocks.content: More direct proof of ~ csbprc (fewer essential steps). (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-csbprc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), emptycls))
} = {
  syl5eq(csb(s0, c0, c1), emptycls, cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  syl(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), emptycls), wal(hs0, wn(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  alrimiv(hs0, wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  con3i(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sbcex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  bj-ab0(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-csbprc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌 →[c0 / s0]c1 = ∅)
} = {
  syl5eq([c0 / s0]c1, emptycls, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c1 }, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  syl(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c1 } = ∅, ∀(hs0, ¬[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c1))
  alrimiv(hs0, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬[c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c1)
  con3i(c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c1)
  sbcex(s0, c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  bj-ab0(hs0, [c0 / s0]hs0 ∈ c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
}
